employee_external_id.notes: Direct mapping - Rippling uses worker_id as primary employee identifier. Validate via custom objects endpoint to ensure existence before mapping.

absence_type_external_id.notes: Direct mapping - Rippling uses leave_type_id for absence/leave type identification. Match to Flip's absence type ID using external_id reference.

status.notes: Conversion mapping - Map to Flip's status field using standardized values. Rippling may use custom statuses - validate allowed values first.

start_date.notes: Direct mapping - Ensure date format consistency (YYYY-MM-DD). Used for conflict detection and calendar management.

end_date.notes: Direct mapping - Mirror start_date formatting. Validate that end_date is not before start_date in mapping logic.

start_half_day.notes: Conversion mapping - Convert boolean to time format (true = '12:00', false = '09:00'). If Flip uses text (AM/PM), convert Rippling's boolean appropriately.

end_half_day.notes: Conversion mapping - Convert boolean to time format (true = '12:00', false = '17:00'). Ensure both half-day fields are mapped consistently.

amount.notes: Conversion mapping - Map to Flip's amount field. Note unit compatibility - ensure unit field aligns (hours vs days). Key for balance deductions and accrual tracking.

unit.notes: Logical mapping - Align with Flip's supported units. Convert if necessary (e.g., Rippling uses 'days' but Flip expects 'hours'). Ensure unit and amount combinations are mathematically consistent.

employee_note.notes: Direct mapping - Map directly to Flip's note or comments field. Truncate if length limits differ between systems. Aids in approval decisions and provides audit trails.

processing_context: Rippling Platform API v1.0.0 - Leave/Absence Management Integration with Flip HRIS

implementation_notes: Validate all external_id fields via Rippling's /custom-objects/ endpoints before mapping
Use webhooks or sync checks to handle status changes post-mapping
Test date and half-day fields with edge cases (cross-timezone requests)
Ensure unit and amount combinations are mathematically consistent
Rippling uses worker_id instead of employee_id for employee identification
Leave types are identified by leave_type_id in Rippling
Time fields require boolean to time conversion for half-day handling
Amount and unit must be converted to minutes (Rippling's base unit)
Status values need enum mapping to Rippling's custom status values
